item.description:
Huge place with a views of forest, open areas, paths, wild flowers, pond.  Gather for a few minutes at the beginning, then, find a view that suits you.  All media and all levels of experience are welcome.   Restrooms at Visitors' Center.  Brief gathering at the end, for discussion of the day.  If you need a ride, let us know and we will try to match you up.  Any thoughts about other venues?

The Meet Ups are scheduled for  2 1/2 to 3 hours.
item.how_to_find_us: visitor parking lot near path to Visitor Center
item.name: Minuteman National Park, Lincoln
